prompt: Wide-angle pixel art scene of a sleek neon-lit AI office. Side-scrolling perspective like a video game level. Dark background (#0a0a0f). 6 pixel characters at desks spaced across the scene, each illuminated by their own neon-colored workstation glow - cyan, magenta, purple, green, orange, teal. Floating holographic UI elements above some desks. Clean 16-bit pixel art style. Neon light reflections on a dark polished floor. Atmosphere: calm, productive, futuristic. Think VA-11 Hall-A bar scene but it's an office. No text.
